item.title: Writing SwiftUI apps With Chat-GPT
item.description: ChatGPT is all the rage nowadays. Personally I’ve used it quite a few times and professionally as a software developer it’s interesting to use. I don’t fear for my job/knowledge (yet!) as it’s mostly integrations and not of the shelf code… (I haven’t tried the hardware space in Chat GPT yet….. paperclips might be optimized..) ✌️ To figure out how useful it might be for me, I embarked on a journey together with ChatGPT to build a piece of software that would solve issues that I’d had with the Mac OS X Finder for a while.
